event.title: FSFE Franken local group meeting in Nürnberg, Germany

body.p: The FSFE Franken local group is a group of engaged volunteers in Franconia that meets once a month and exchanges ideas about software freedom in the region.
For this meeting, Florian Snow will give a short overview of recent FSFE activities and then we will socialize over pizza that the FSFE generously offered to pay for.
This meeting will take place in K4CG, Königsstraße 93, Nürnberg and will take place from 17:00 - 19:00 UTC/19:00 - 21:00 local time. We can offer the meeting in English or German, at your choice.
